title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the scope, objectives, and requirements for the PhilosophicalGodAI project, including the philosophical questions to be addressed, the desired level of intelligence, the expected capabilities of the AI system, the ethical considerations, and the potential impact on society.

title: Conduct Philosophical Research
description: Perform extensive research on various philosophical topics, theories, and debates to gather a comprehensive understanding of the questions to be addressed by the AI system.

title: Design AI Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture and components of the AI system, including the neural network architecture, knowledge representation, reasoning mechanisms, learning algorithms, and ethical considerations.

title: Develop Knowledge Base
description: Create a comprehensive knowledge base to store and organize the philosophical information and data required for the AI system to reason and draw conclusions.

title: Implement AI Components
description: Implement the various components of the AI system, including the neural network, knowledge representation, reasoning engines, and learning algorithms, based on the designed architecture.
